title: Design Portfolio Center
summary: Provides mentoring for aspiring designers or UI/UX professionals looking to improve their skills and web portfolio.
responsibilities: Mentor for designers enrolled in the program, providing tutoring on low-code portfolio options like Webflow and Framer.
Built several front-end components using lit-html and Web Components.
Set up the foundation for creating custom Wordpress Gutenberg blocks for lit-html components, allowing content editors to add, preview, and edit components on pages.
features: Custom Gutenberg blocks for content editing
